main event: An unidentified object was observed on ground-radar at Lowry AFB, Colorado on Feb 22, 1959.
interesting points: The object descended slowly before disappearing from the radar., Weather conditions were reported as good at the time of the sighting., The object was confirmed to be one single object., The observation lasted for approximately 2-3 minutes., There was no visual confirmation of the object despite the radar detection.
witness description: The record mentions no visual sighting by the observer.
